column2: Goldman fails to dismiss Prudential mortgage fraud lawsuit April 9 Goldman Sachs Group Inc must face a lawsuit in which Prudential Financial Inc accused the Wall Street bank of defrauding it into buying more than $375 million of residential mortgage-backed securities it knew were unsafe.
